Posts.Content: Go for it! They work great for me however it does take some practice. Once you get the hang of it, its easy! good luck Kathie

Posts.Title: Panel wants Avastin withdrawn for breast cancer

Posts.Content: I am going to buy a juicer this weekend so I will definitly be into sharing and trying new recipes. I keep saying to my beau why are we going through all this if "we" arn't going to make positive changes for our future. So far I have gotten him to eat a bannana almost everyday, other than that changing his ways is a nightmare! I eat much better now and I think juicing will make it even more fun! Kathie
